1. Open eclipse,
2. Open our editor (our editor is an ActiveX control)
3. Close eclipse
4. Restart eclipse

Then sometimes the above error occurs.

Opening the ole document is generating an unneeded shell activation callback.
Added null checks in drawGradient.
